title: Elegoo Launches Nexprint Million-Dollar Creator Fund to Reward Original Content
description: Elegoo, a rapidly developing brand in global smart manufacturing, today launches a $ 1 Million creator fund to encourage and reward outstanding original creators who share exceptional content in Nexprint. The fund will be distributed over one year to grant Nexprint creators who submit their original designs to the platform. It also includes alliance reward which is aimed for those who help invite submissions to the platform.
content:
This is the first seven-digit fund to help creators earn from original 3D model designs.

SHENZHEN, China, Aug. 8, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Elegoo, a rapidly developing brand in global smart manufacturing, today launches a $ 1 Million creator fund to encourage and reward outstanding original creators who share exceptional content in Nexprint. The fund will be distributed over one year to grant Nexprint creators who submit their original designs to the platform. It also includes alliance reward which is aimed for those who help invite submissions to the platform.

Each month, we will invest in a reward pool to grant $ 5 to each approved submission. There is no exclusivity capped on the design. Exceptional designs will be rewarded with an extra $ 5 each and featured for priority exposure in Nexprint. There is no restriction on the number of monthly submissions by an individual creator. For outstanding creators, we can offer long-term collaborations.

For alliance reward, creators can receive additional tiered invitation bonuses by inviting other creators to join and upload models, with a maximum of $100 per month.

The reward is granted monthly on a first-come-first-served basis with the first phase starting from August 9 to August 31. The left amount available in each month will be updated live on Nexprint.com. Starting from September, the total available reward amount will be renewed on the first day of each month.

"This fund shows our commitment to delivering the best user experience to Nexprint community by hosting a tremendous amount of 3D models accessible to everyone " said Chris Hong, CEO at Elegoo." We greatly value originality in this industry. Nexprint will be a perfect platform to showcase creators' original ideas. We believe in here every design will pay off."

Nexprint, newly launched on August 4, is an open-source community designed to connect makers worldwide by enabling seamless sharing and downloading of 3D models.

For more information on how to join and win the reward, please visit www.nexprint.com.

Founded in 2015, Elegoo is a rapidly developing brand in the global smart manufacturing industry, specializing in R&D, manufacturing, and sales of consumer-grade 3D printers, laser engravers, STEM kits, and other smart technology products. Located in Shenzhen, the Silicon Valley of China, the company has sold millions of products across more than 100 countries and regions. In 2024, the company's total sales revenue surpassed 220 million USD, with more than 1000 employees and nearly 30,000 square meters of office and manufacturing area. With a focus on programming and 3D printing technology, Elegoo provides unique and smart creation spaces for diverse consumers to enhance personalized experiences.
summary: Elegoo, a global smart manufacturing brand, has launched a $ 1 Million creator fund to reward outstanding original creators who share exceptional content in Nexprint. The fund will be distributed over one year to grant Nexprint creators who submit their original designs to the platform. Each month, the fund will invest in a reward pool to grant $ 5 to each approved submission, with an extra $ 5 each and featured for priority exposure. For outstanding creators, we can offer long-term collaborations. The reward is granted monthly on a first-come-first-served basis, with the first phase starting from August 9 to August 31.
shortSummary: Elegoo launches a $1 million creator fund for Nexprint, rewarding exceptional 3D model creators with monthly rewards and collaboration bonuses.

scraped_sources.text:
1
How to Participate
Click [Upload Now] on the event page
Go to Nexprint → Upload → Select the event tag#1 Million Creator Fund
2
Submission Guidelines
Originality
Only original or remix models are eligible.
The same model cannot be submitted more than once for this event.
Minor remixes of the same series model are not eligible for multiple rewards.
Upload Guidelines
1)Cover Image：
A real photo of the printed model. Do not use rendered images, slicer previews, AI-generated images, or any non-printed visuals.
2)Print Pofiles：
Including print profiles is recommended For FDM models, we recommend using Elegoo Slicer or Orca Slicer to export a .3mf file For Resin models, export and upload a .stl file using Elegoo Satelite
Model Visibility
Once a model has received a reward, it cannot be hidden or removed. If a user deletes their account, the platform reserves the right to continue displaying their models.
3
Submission Themes
You can submit models on any topic. However, models that match the monthly featured theme will qualify for the Fast-Track, meaning:
Faster review priority
Higher chances of winning an extra bonus for good quality
4
Event Rewards
Basic Reward:
Each reviewed model earns a $5 cash reward.
Additional Reward:
High-quality models may earn an additional $5 reward, based on: print profiles included, practicality or utility, structural complexity, originality, presentation quality, and so on. practical value, structure complexity, originality, content presentation, etc. *Nexprint reserves the right of final interpretation.

argos_summary: Elegoo has launched a $1 million creator fund to support original 3D model designers on its new platform, Nexprint. The fund will reward creators with $5 for each approved submission, with additional bonuses for exceptional designs and for those who invite others to join the platform. The initiative aims to enhance the user experience by promoting originality and providing a space for creators to showcase their work.
